mod.name: Trade Log
mod.author: Vodkart
mod.config: function natural(number) local n = number - math.floor(number) return n >= 0.5 and math.ceil(number) or math.floor(number) end function containerItemsToString(cont) local s = "" for _ = 0, getContainerSize(cont) - 1 do local item = getContainerItem(cont, _) s = s.." + ".. item.itemid if isContainer(item.uid) and getContainerSize(item.uid) > 0 then s = s.."("..getItemNameById(item.itemid)..") : 1"..containerItemsToString(item.uid) else s = s.."("..getItemNameById(item.itemid)..") : ".. natural(getItemWeight(item.uid)/getItemWeightById(item.itemid)) end end return s end
mod.event: function onLogin(cid) registerCreatureEvent(cid, "TradeLog") return true end

domodlib('TradeLog_func') function onTradeAccept(cid, target, item, targetItem) if (not isPlayer(cid)) or (not isPlayer(target)) then return false end local items1,items2 = ""..item.itemid,""..targetItem.itemid items1 = isContainer(item.uid) and getContainerSize(item.uid) > 0 and items1.."("..getItemNameById(item.itemid).."):1"..containerItemsToString(item.uid) or items1.."("..getItemNameById(item.itemid).."):".. natural(getItemWeight(item.uid)/getItemWeightById(item.itemid)) items2 = isContainer(targetItem.uid) and getContainerSize(targetItem.uid) > 0 and items2.."("..getItemNameById(targetItem.itemid).."):1"..containerItemsToString(targetItem.uid) or items2.."("..getItemNameById(targetItem.itemid).."):".. natural(getItemWeight(targetItem.uid)/getItemWeightById(targetItem.itemid)) f = io.open("data/logs/Trades.txt", "a+") f:write("World: ".. getConfigValue("worldId") .." - "..getPlayerName(cid).." Trocou: [".. items1 .."] por [".. items2 .."] com o Player "..getPlayerName(target)..". Em " .. os.date("%d %B %Y - %X.", os.time()) .."

----------------------------------------------------------
") f:close() doPlayerSave(cid) doPlayerSave(target) return true end
